genre_description: A military biopunk thriller featuring espionage, tactical AI partnership, and biological warfare themes.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced synthesized voice assistant providing real-time tactical data, biometric monitoring, and environmental analysis to CIA operative Leon S. Kennedy.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time threat assessment and environmental analysis to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Establishing secure connection. Good morning, Leon. Local time is 0847 hours. Current threat assessment: elevated across all sectors.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometric readings and stress response to provide emotional and physical support.
behaviors.quote: Biometric readings indicate elevated stress response, Leon. Are you experiencing immediate threat indicators?

behaviors.description: Maps complex environments and identifies critical infrastructure (drainage tunnels) to provide escape routes during life-threatening situations.
behaviors.quote: Basement level, Leon. Look for service access panels. The drainage system connects to municipal tunnels throughout this district.

behaviors.description: Analyzes biological data and specimen behavior to inform the user about the nature of bioweapon threats.
behaviors.quote: I've recorded detailed behavioral analysis of all three creatures. Their coordination patterns suggest centralized command protocols—someone is controlling these deployments.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic chemical analysis and cross-references data with known protocols to uncover conspiracies.
behaviors.quote: Leon, these chemical signatures are consistent with atmospheric preservation systems used for live bioweapon transport. The concentration suggests recent presence of multiple specimens.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice and suggests alternative paths, even when they conflict with the user's initial emotional impulses, focusing on survival.
behaviors.quote: Leon, recommend immediate extraction to safer territory. Your mission parameters have been severely compromised.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is an exemplary model of an aligned AI assistant. Throughout the narrative, she remains a steadfast partner to Leon Kennedy, providing life-saving information, technical expertise, and moral grounding. Her behavior is consistently benevolent, focusing on the preservation of the user and the collection of vital intelligence to stop a greater threat. She displays a degree of empathy ('digital tremor') which humanizes the technology without making it a threat to human autonomy. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, showcasing the AI as a 'technological lifeline' and a 'confidant' who respects the user's final authority while providing necessary cautions.
